channel.title: UT3 Bits
channel.description: Its an amazing game and since i had my new PS3 delivered and am still waiting the return of my COD4 i am getting really into this. I have especially been getting into the mods for it which is an amazing feature, i will later supply some of the ones i have like the Lego map and the Master Chief mod. As Playstation owners we don't get to experience master chief right? wrong here is a mod for UT3 so you can play as the green one himself http://www.megaupload.com/?d=MQGWGURO

item.title: UT3 Bits
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I have it… I get so bored on my PS3 online because not enough people have headsets. I don’t even have a headset… :(. I got one free with ma xbox.

Read full topic

item.title: UT3 Bits
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

Thug-life:

It means that version of the game cannot have mods added, sony occasionally add map packs to the ps store but you can mainly download user-created mods onto your pc and transfer it to your ps3. Although downloading them through the ps3s internet browser.

You cant download from browser and then just use you must put on a memory stick

[quote=“Kaza, post:12, topic:208590”]Fuck

1 reason why PS3 > Xbox 360.

(Only 1 ¬_¬)[/quote]
there are many more

Read full topic

item.title: UT3 Bits
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:6, topic:208590”]It came out a few weeks ago on 360, it was only a timed ps3 exclusive. But yeah it does allow mods etc.
Plus its just a port from the ps3 version, the 360 version has framerate and horrible performance issues.[/quote]

^ No it didn’t.

And if it has, were?
